overview:
UrbanGain is a place to find great deals on up-market products & services in your city. We are a group buying site, which is using the power of internet to aggregate people and provide great deals on services like Spa, Fine Dining, Luxury Saloons, Beauty Clinics Services, Club Entries, Discotheques, Watches and much more.

We reach your customers through a trendy web, mobile and social platform. We deliver high mind share through customer engagements. With no fixed cost, we offer you a zero risk and high returns proposition.

Group buying is the new online social trend that has been in existence only for past couple of month and has helped businesses across the globe phenomenally. Retailers worldwide are using this platform to increase their sales.

What You Get:

Increased footfalls

New customer acquisition Higher mindshare Social connect Recommendations/ word of mouth (WOM) publicity

Salient Features

  1. No Business Risk. We work on a pay-per business basis, where you pay only when you get business. No Business risk. Bang for your money.

  2. Multiple touch-points. Free Email marketing, SMS Marketing and Social Media Marketing. Get featured for free on our premium space â€“ thousands of eyeballs, free of charge.

  3. No marketing personnel required. Our consultants will help you design the deal best for your business.

  4. Spend only on new customers. Run your regular business side by side the promotions. Discounts would be applicable only for customers carrying pre-purchased coupons.

  5. Power of social community. Existing customers invite their friends to try the services they like in a low risk way. High degree of satisfaction leads to long term retention. Discussions on your deal lead to high impact Word of Mouth (WOM) publicity for free.
